project1.title: Project 1
project1.description: Website redesign for a local business
project1.challenges: The main challenge was creating a responsive design that would work seamlessly across all devices while maintaining the client's brand identity.
project1.results: The new website increased mobile traffic by 45% and improved conversion rates by 25%.

project2.title: Project 2
project2.challenges: Implementing a secure payment system and optimizing the checkout process for maximum conversion.
project2.results: Successfully launched with 100+ products and achieved 95% customer satisfaction rate.
